snippet: “Life Is a Bitch,” Mary Foster Conklin’s cabaret show devoted to Fran Landesman’s words, includes some of Landesman’s verses and more than a dozen of her songs.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert of songs by lyricist Fran Landesman performed by cabaret singer Mary Foster Conklin at Metropolitan Room.
lead_paragraph: “Life Is a Bitch,” Mary Foster Conklin’s cabaret show devoted to Fran Landesman’s words, includes some of Landesman’s verses and more than a dozen of her songs.

headline.seo: Mary Foster Conklin Bashes Bourgeoisie at Metropolitan Room
headline.main: A Poetic Rebel Full of Salt and Vinegar
headline.print_headline: A Poetic Rebel Full of Salt and Vinegar
